collection.description: The collection name for result data

account_id.description: The Adwords account id that you want to analyze

include_zero_impressions.description: Include all dimensions including ones that doesn't have any value

query.value: SELECT AccountCurrencyCode, AccountDescriptiveName, AccountTimeZoneId, AdGroupAdTrademarkDisapproved, AdGroupId, AdGroupName, PrimaryCompanyName, Quarter, ShortHeadline, Status, Trademarks, ValuePerAllConversion, ValuePerConversion, VideoQuartile100Rate, VideoQuartile25Rate, VideoQuartile50Rate, VideoQuartile75Rate, VideoViewRate, VideoViews, ViewThroughConversions FROM AD_PERFORMANCE_REPORT
query.description: The AWQL query you want to execute. You can find the schema here: https://www.awql.me/adwords-awql-help/

developer_token.description: The developer token of your approved app

client_secret.description: The client secret of your app

client_id.description: The client id of your app
